p.span: “Small town boys working on BIG dreams.” They start off each season with ONE goal, STATE CHAMPS. Next week they have a chance to make their dream come true, keep working Bobcats! We are beyond proud of each and every one of you!

div.span: Welcome to Refugio Independent School District
div.br: Thank you for visiting Refugio Independent School District. We are very proud of our schools, our staff, and most importantly, our students. We hope this site is helpful in sharing information with you regarding the events and activities of our school district.

span.em: Click on a highlighted day to see events for that day

div.div: The Refugio Independent School District is committed to providing an appropriate learning experience for every child in the district, designed to motivate and assist each child in the attainment of his or her maximum potential intellectually, physically, socially, economically, and morally.
